nl.esciencecenter.esight.shaders

Class ShaderProgramLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.shaders.ShaderProgramLoader

  • public class ShaderProgramLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loader/convenience class for ShaderProgram instances. Different formats for shader source inclusion are possible (files, strings). Shader programs can be constructed consisting of VertexShader and FragmentShader, and an optional GeometryShader.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
    See Also:
    ShaderProgram

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderProgramLoader()
      Constructor, initializes storage.

    • Method Detail

      • createProgram

        public ShaderProgram createProgram(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
                          java.lang.String programName,
                          java.io.File vsSourceFile,
                          java.io.File gsSourceFile,
                          java.io.File fsSourceFile)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   CompilationFailedException
        Creation method for ShaderProgram instances. Reads, parses, checks, compiles and initializes Shader source code. Then stores a reference to it.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        programName - Internal name for this Shader Program.
        vsSourceFile - Source file for VertexShader.
        gsSourceFile - Source file for GeometryShader.
        fsSourceFile - Source file for FragmentShader.
        Returns:
        The shader program just created.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if one of the source files can not be found.
        CompilationFailedException - if one of the source compilations generates an error.

      • createProgram

        public ShaderProgram createProgram(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
                          VertexShader vs,
                          FragmentShader fs)
        Creation method for ShaderProgram instances. Compiles and initializes predefined Shader source code. Then stores a reference to it.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        vs - A predefined VertexShader
        fs - A predefined FragmentShader
        Returns:
        The shader program just created.

      • deleteProgram

        public void deleteProgram(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
                 ShaderProgram program)
        Deletes a ShaderProgram instance from the loader storage in the proper manner.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.
        program - The program to be deleted.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Deletes ALL ShaderProgram instances from the loader storage in the proper manner.
        Parameters:
        gl - The global openGL instance.

      • setUniformVector

        public void setUniformVector(java.lang.String pointerNameInShader,
                    VectorF var)
        Stages a given variable for all currently loaded ShaderProgram instances. (use only in exceptional circumstances)
        Parameters:
        pointerNameInShader - The name of the variable in the GLSL source code.
        var - The value to be staged.
